item.title: Abandoned Audi Q7, 24th September
item.description:
This car was dumped and black teenager's ran out from it, it has been left on the estate and it's not parked correctly and blocking access. Please send someone to remove this vehicle, the windows are left open and it's a hazard where it is parked.
